actions.msg: Pop: the player is reminded that Rugga still holds sway over many fighting men. With a hard fight coming, Hero will need to consolidate them and also coax a cure from Rugga for the Kingâ€™s sickness.

Pop: bells toll amidst dire circumstances. Word travels that the King has died. In a rage, Hero returns to confront Rugga in prison and settle issues with clansmen. Oddleif insists on joining.
If Hero went to talk with Rugga, the bells toll during the conversation.

Pop: the darkness touches the outside walls. It is strikingly clear that time will be harder and harder to buy after this point. Food, supplies and protection of the menders have risen to top priority. Population: hundreds of thousands.

Pop: the darkness tightens its grip, living space closes in. Hero is forced to resolve the infighting and anarchy rampant in the streets and unify the horseborn, varl and clansmen or die trying, either by cunning or by brute force. Population: tens of thousands.

Pop: the Menders retreat to the black rock walls. Dredge are starting to creep out of underground dungeons and sewers, inside the walls. The remaining food and water is imperilled in the process. Population: a few thousand.

This used to be a whole thing with Nid and ships, but now that happens earlier, and this is going to be something else. But I don't know what. That is a mystery only Alex can solve.
Clansmen try to make ships and escape. Nid may die.
Supporting menders against warped. Combat. Ludin may die.
Appears only after all other events are completed. If not dead, a warped Ruin appears and causes massive problems for the survivors, cutting heavily into their time.
Resolve infighting, especially against Canary. Derdrui may die.
Deal with horror of warped allies. Combat. Kingsguard dies.
Deal with a spreading fire. Griss may die.
Quiet before the storm, conversations with allies. Unlocks Clickable 2 and 3.
Rest vs Vigilance. Hogun or Mogun may die.
Dredge are burrowing into the basements. Combat. Cave in the basement. Tryggvi may die.
